2025-08-14T06:00:00.CONTENT_EN: Amber Rainstorm Warning Signal is in force. Due to wet weather and slippery roads, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. plan the journey in advance; ii. allow more traveling time; iii. drive with extra care and patience; and iv. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-08-14T06:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 黃色暴雨警告信號現已生效，天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.提早計劃行程路線； ii.預留充裕時間出門； iii.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 iv.留意交通情況，特别在視線受阻的繁忙路口。

2025-08-14T08:34:00.CONTENT_EN:
Some entrances/exits of Hong Kong West Kowloon Station closed

Due to adverse weather conditions, Entrance/Exit C at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station is closed for preventive purpose. Please use other entrances/exits. 


High Speed Rail train service remains normal.
2025-08-14T08:34:00.CONTENT_CN:
香港西九龍站部分出入口暫時關閉

由於天氣情況惡劣，香港西九龍站C出入口暫時關閉以作預防措施，請使用其他出入口。

高速鐵路服務維持正常。

2025-08-14T11:35:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Entrance/Exit C of Hong Kong West Kowloon Station is reopened.
2025-08-14T11:35:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，香港西九龍站C出入口重新開放。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Bus services affected by adverse weather
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 受惡劣天氣影響的巴士服務安排

2025-08-14T12:38:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to the adverse weather, the bus services arrangement are as follows: CTB Suspended: H1、H1S、H2、H3、H4 Limited Service：6、6X、9、14、15、63、66、73、260、973
2025-08-14T12:38:00.CONTENT_CN: 因受惡劣天氣影響，以下巴⼠服務安排如下： 城巴 暫停⾏駛：H1、H1S、H2、H3、H4 有限度服務：6、6X、9、14、15、63、66、73、260、973

2025-08-14T15:06:00.CONTENT_EN:
The following road sections are busy:
Kowloon
– Jordan Road (Elements bound)
– Austin Road (Hung Hom bound)
– Nathan Road (Mong Kok bound) near Jordan Road
– Gascoigne Road (Yau Ma Tei bound)
Motorists passing through the above road sections are advised to drive with utmost care and patience.
2025-08-14T15:06:00.CONTENT_CN:
以下路段的交通繁忙:
九龍
–佐敦道(往圓方方向)
–柯士甸道(往紅磡方向)
–彌敦道(往旺角方向)近佐敦道
–加士居道(往油麻地方向)
駕駛人士行經上述路段敬請忍讓及小心駕駛。

2025-08-14T20:18:00.CONTENT_EN: Motorists are advised that, the number of cross-boundary private cars travelling to and from the Mainland via Lok Ma Chau Control Point may increase in the small hours of 16 to 18, 20 to 21 and 24 August 2025. Subject to actual traffic condition, special traffic arrangement may be implemented at the approaches to the Lok Ma Chau Control Point during the period concerned to allow smooth access of passenger service vehicles to above control point. Cross-boundary private cars are expected to take a longer time to pass through the control point. Motorists are advised to pay extra attention to the traffic management measures to be implemented by the Police on the approaches to the control point. They are also advised to be patient in case of traffic congestion, and follow the instructions of the Police.
2025-08-14T20:18:00.CONTENT_CN: 駕駛人士請注意，在2025年8月16至18日、20至21日及24日的凌晨時段經落馬洲管制站往來內地的跨境私家車或會增加。視乎現場交通情況，通往落馬洲管制站的道路在有關時段或會實施特別交通安排，以便公共運輸車輛能暢順地進入上述管制站。跨境私家車輪候通過口岸的時間預計會較長。 駕駛人士請特別留意警方在通往管制站的道路上實施的交通管理措施，如遇交通受阻，請保持忍讓及遵從警務人員的指示。

2025-08-15T12:54:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Kai Tak Sports Park will host G. E. M. WORLD TOUR concerts in the evenings of 15 - 17 and 19 - 20 August. Passengers can access the venue either from Kai Tak or Sung Wong Toi stations. After the show, train frequency will be enhanced as necessary. Passengers please have your ticket ready. If passengers need to cross the boundary, please note the departure times of the last trains connecting to Lo Wu: Sung Wong Toi Station: 22:59 Kai Tak Station: 23:01
2025-08-15T12:54:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知， 啟德體育園於8月15 –17 及19 –20日晚上舉行G.E.M.世界巡迴演唱會，前往觀賞的乘客可使用啟德或宋皇臺站。 散場時，港鐵公司會按需要加密列車班次，請乘客預先準備好回程車票。 需要過境的乘客，記得留意接駁至羅湖尾班車時間： 宋皇臺站:22:59 啟德站:23:01

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park Now Full
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿

2025-08-16T13:05:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park is now full. Please use public transport to reach the station.
2025-08-16T13:05:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知， 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿。請使用公共交通工具前往。
